Key Match Events: Christian Eriksen scored and assisted a goal for Denmark in the win.
Pierre-Emile Højbjerg scored the opening goal for Denmark in the first 90 seconds.
Alexander Isak scored for Sweden after a loose ball fell to him.
Christian Eriksen scored the winning goal for Denmark in the dying moments of the match.
Post-Match Reflections: Denmark continued their preparation for EURO 2024 with a pulsating 2-1 win against rivals Sweden.
Denmark will hope to add another morale-boosting victory before the Euros as they host Norway on Saturday.
Sweden’s summer ends after their game at home to Serbia.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Denmark marked a 14th win in 16 games at home.
Flashscore Man of the Match: Christian Eriksen (Denmark).
